body_html:
Actually can we have something like this in a single place, and use the type alias everywhere else?

#ifdef __PPC64__
using default_partitioner_type = tbb::simple_partitioner;
#else
using default_partitioner_type = tbb::affinity_partitioner;
#endif
body:
Actually can we have something like this in a single place, and use the type alias everywhere else?
```cpp
#ifdef __PPC64__
using default_partitioner_type = tbb::simple_partitioner;
#else
using default_partitioner_type = tbb::affinity_partitioner;
#endif
```
